Class CommentController

java.lang.Object
com.inkronsane.ReadArticlesServer.controller.CommentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/comments") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") public class CommentController extends Object
Controller for managing comments. Author: Hybalo Oleksandr Date: 2024-05-13

  • Method Details

    • createComment

      @PostMapping("/create") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CommentPayload> createComment(@RequestBody CommentPayload commentPayload, Principal principal)
      Creates a new comment.
      Parameters:
      commentPayload - The payload containing comment data.
      principal - The authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with CommentPayload containing the created comment.

    • search

      @GetMapping("/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CommentPayload> search(CommentSearch commentSearch, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page)
      Searches comments based on the provided search criteria.
      Parameters:
      commentSearch - The search criteria.
      page - Page number for pagination (default is 0).
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with CommentPayload containing the search results.

    • updateComment

      @PatchMapping("/update/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CommentPayload> updateComment(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody CommentPayload payload, Principal principal)
      Updates an existing comment.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the comment to update.
      payload - The payload containing updated comment data.
      principal - The authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with CommentPayload containing the updated comment.

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CommentPayload> delete(@PathVariable Long id, Principal principal)
      Deletes a comment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the comment to delete.
      principal - The authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with CommentPayload containing the deleted comment.
